no_tts_platforms.title: Chime TTS
no_tts_platforms.description:
â„¹ï¸ No TTS Platforms Found.

The Chime TTS integration uses TTS platform/s already installed in your Home Assistant Instance.

Please add at least 1 TTS platform to begin using it.

For more details please review the documentation.

init.title: Chime TTS Configuration
init.description:
Configurable options for the `chime_tts.say` and `chime_tts.say_url` actions.

Please review the [documentation](https://nimroddolev.github.io/chime_tts/docs/documentation/configuration/) for more details

data.default_language_key: Default language (when using default TTS platform)
data.default_voice_key: Default voice (when using default TTS platform)
data.default_tld_key: Default dialect (when using the Google Translate TTS platform)
data.offset: Default offset value (in milliseconds) between chimes & TTS audio
data.fade_transition_key: Fade transition (in milliseconds) when fading currently playing audio for `announce` and `fade_audio`
data.remove_temp_file_delay: Delay (in milliseconds) before removing temporary files
data.custom_chimes_path: Folder path for custom chime audio files
data.temp_chimes_path: Folder path for downloaded chime audio files
data.temp_path: Folder path for temporary TTS audio mp3 files
data.www_path: Folder path for Chime TTS mp3s generated by `chime_tts.say_url`
data.add_cover_art: Add Chime TTS cover art to generated MP3 files
